content: teddy bear sweater a simple sweater in four flat parts fits a teddy with 12 inch chest and 8 inch neck gauge using us size 5 needles and casting on 22 stitches and working in stockinette for 10 row should make a swatch about 3x1 inches body make 2 cast on 42 stitches rib 1x1 ktbl rib for 5 row stockinette start with p row for 13 row or until 2 long decrease every other row as follows to 28 sts k1 ssk k to 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 cast off 28 stitches sleeves make 2 co 28 sts rib 1x1 ktbl 3 row stockinette start with p row for 11 row cast off 9 sts at beginning of next 2 row 10 sts remain decrease every other row as follows k1 ssk k to 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 when there are 4 sts remaining ssk k2tog cast off last two sts joining sew sides of body together from the ribbing to where the decreases begin join the side of the sleeves sew sleeves into arm holes with seams down and triangle section up join tops of body sections to triangle sections of sleeves sleeve body
